description: Workplace supervisor evaluates student's professionalism, motivation, attitude, independence, initiative, and contribution using a rubric.

Includes fortnightly reflective professional development posts (250-300 words each) and final submissions: a 1000-word reflection on achieving course outcomes and a 1000-word showcase of key placement tasks/deliverables with feedback analysis.

Comprises a professional development Placement Plan (15%) created with supervisor input and completion of three online WIL modules (15%) with summative quizzes (one discipline-specific, two professional development).
